page.title: 09SHOPPING IN HELMSHORE.
page.content:
There are few shops in our area, but they sell the main essentials, so you don't need to go very far to get all the things you want. The main shopping can be done in Manchester. It is quick and easy to get there, because of the new M66 motorway.
There is a shop which is not really a grocers because it sells cakes and vegetables and it also sells sweets and frozen goods. There is a shop that sells videos, food, drinks etc. At a hardwear shop they sell bikes, D.I.Y. materials, a few garden tools, toys, watches, wallpaper and suchlike. There is a D.I.Y.shop,which is also a builders merchants and it sells bricks, cement, slate, wood, sheds and tools.
